attributes.action: Carry a knife do life before you take a life
attributes.additional_details: Get more police more stop a search’s give these people more help and guidance before these knifes even hit our streets. Save life’s enough have been lost !
attributes.background: I want longer sentences or life for those who are caught with a life  on our streets as they would intend to take someone’s life and then a family is in suffering over someone actions while they get there life in jail but still they get visits and all perks  that or a life for a life
